title: Service Fabric VSCode Extension Architecture
body:
This VSCode extension provides Service Fabric cluster management and diagnostic capabilities. Core modules:

- **sfMgr.ts**: Main manager class coordinating all SF operations, cluster management, Azure integration
- **sfConfiguration.ts**: Cluster configuration management, manifest parsing (XML/JSON), node/app/service tracking
- **sfRest.ts / sfRestClient.ts**: REST API communication with Service Fabric clusters
- **sfClusterExplorer.ts**: TreeView provider for cluster visualization in VSCode explorer
- **serviceFabricClusterView.ts**: Main cluster view component with tree item management
- **sfPs.ts**: PowerShell command execution for local cluster operations
- **sfPrompts.ts**: User input prompts for cluster endpoints and operations
- **sfExtSecrets.ts / sfExtSettings.ts**: Secure credential and settings management

The extension uses Azure SDK packages (@azure/arm-servicefabric, @azure/servicefabric) and integrates with Azure authentication.
rationale: Provides essential context about the extension's architecture and module responsibilities for code navigation and modifications
